__e: I wanted to show her what if felt to be paparazzied and hung out to dry.
A man took a picture of me and my girlfriend. He wanted us to buy it.
The portrait of a family was just taken... and I assumed that I was part of that family.
I'm standing here thinking I'm ready to get my picture took.
I don't understand why you didn't ask if I wanted to be in the photos.
About how there are... shiny people who have everything, and then there are people like us who have to go to parties with those people and watch them get their pictures taken, and it's not fair.
